Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Two deutsche Tänze, Hess 67

c. 1811–1812 · Biamonti 551

Total duration: 1'

  • 1. F major
  • 2. F minor

Recommended editions

  • Breitkopf & Härtel · Supplemente zur Gesamtausgabe IX / Klavierwerke; Kammermusikwerke mit Klavier · ed. Willy Hess

1. F major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

2. F minor

The first dance should be repeated (da capo) after the second dance.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2
